name: No Tea In Heaven
description:
Strongly recommend playing with Xbox controllers.

Play as either Earl or Gray, steal 3 tea bags before your opponent while trying not to get caught by the team of exorcists who are patrolling the house.

May the better ghost win!

Instructions in game!

*****************************

Attributions:

Sound effects:
All done with mouth by the team except for when guard notices a ghost. 
That one is from Freesounds.

Music:
All the music is from Youtube's Audio Library.

Art:
Everything done by the team.

Code:
Sebastian Lague's and Brackeys tutorials on youtube.
